name: Simulator X-Ray - Finger Prank
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true X-Ray.
Simulation X-Ray Finger Joke - a joke simulation game where you can play on your phone with both the X-ray for your finger. The game uses a camera for a more realistic effect!
Warning finger X-rays simulator only and will not harm your health!
Make fun and play your family and friends!
Thank you for choosing our apps and games! Leave feedback for the games and we make them better!
